flawed_nl_solution:
40% of the class is boys because 100-60=<<100-60=20>>20
There are 5 boys because 25x.4=<<25*.4=5>>5
60% of the boys don't like playing basketball because 100-40=<<100-40=60>>60
6 boys don't like playing basketball because 5x.6=3
12 girls like playing basketball because 3x2=<<3*2=6>>6
There are 20 girls in the class because 25-5=<<25-5=20>>20
80% of the girls in class like playing basketball because 6/20=<<6/20=0.3>>0.3
#### 0.3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
